alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 31 at 5:51AM AKST until January 03 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...North winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Valdez and Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Wind chill values are expected to be 40 below to 55 below through Thompson Pass Saturday night.
info.instruction: A high wind watch means there is potential for a hazardous high wind event. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
